Uses of Class
rt.Ray

  • Packages that use Ray 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.cameras
    Implementations of the Camera interface.
    rt.integrators
    Implementations of the Integrator interface.
    rt.intersectables
    Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
    rt.lightsources
    Implementations of the LightGeometry interface.

    • Uses of Ray in rt

      Methods in rt that return Ray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ray Camera.makeWorldSpaceRay(int i, int j, float[] sample)
      Given a ray in image space, make a ray in world space according to the camera specifications.
      Methods in rt with parameters of type Ray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spectrum Integrator.integrate(Ray r)
      Compute contribution of a ray to the image.
      HitRecord Intersectable.intersect(Ray r)
      Implement ray-surface intersection in this method.

    • Uses of Ray in rt.cameras

      Methods in rt.cameras that return Ray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ray FixedCamera.makeWorldSpaceRay(int i, int j, float[] sample)
      Make a world space ray.
      Ray DummyCamera.makeWorldSpaceRay(int i, int j, float[] sample)
      Make a ray whose x- and y- coordinates in the direction vector are in the range [0,1] over the image plane.

    • Uses of Ray in rt.integrators

      Methods in rt.integrators with parameters of type Ray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spectrum PointLightIntegrator.integrate(Ray r)
      Basic integrator that simply iterates over the light sources and accumulates their contributions.
      Spectrum MandelbrotIntegrator.integrate(Ray r)
      Compute Mandelbrot set.
      Spectrum DebugIntegrator.integrate(Ray r)
      Return some value useful for debugging.
